text.section: Each license issued under this subtitle shall state the address or addresses at which business is to be conducted, the name of the licensee, and the date and place of its incorporation, if applicable.
A licensee shall post a copy of such license in a conspicuous place in the office to which it pertains.
A license may not be transferred or assigned without the prior written approval of the commissioner.
No licensee shall transact the business provided for by this subtitle under any other name or maintain an office at any location other than that designated in the license.
Every licensed mortgage loan company or mortgage loan broker shall notify the commissioner, in writing, within ten (10) days of the closing of any licensed office or registered Kentucky branch.
